page.title: 17A TYPICAL SUNDAY MORNING
page.content: My{Sunday}morning{lifestyle}is like this. I get up at 9 o'clock. The rest of my{family}are usually still asleep. I try to make as much noise as I can, like pulling the chain on the toilet and running the tap. I do this to wake my brother up who would stay in bed all day if he could. I go downstairs into the kitchen and get myself some orange juice as I can't stand tea or coffee. If I have woken my brother he emerges from his bedroom and clumps downstairs. I take my Mum and Dad some tea that is if I don't trip over the dog on the stairs. I then get into my jeans and go round to my friend Lizzy's house. She's usually asleep or in her nightdress. If by some miracle she's ready we go round to Susie's house and{play}'Nine Nine' or 'Leap Frog' or take the dog for a walk. I go home for lunch at 1.00pm.
